solution_line_template: The cost of the geography books is {num_geography_books} * {cost_geography_book} = $<<{num_geography_books}*{cost_geography_book}={cost_geography_books}>>{cost_geography_books}.
The cost of the English books is {num_english_books} * {cost_english_book} = $<<{num_english_books}*{cost_english_book}={cost_english_books}>>{cost_english_books}.
The total amount of the order is {cost_geography_books} + {cost_english_books} = $<<{cost_geography_books}+{cost_english_books}={total_order_amount}>>{total_order_amount}.
